dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2574 IS: Healthy Families Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Fischer introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To make the United States Preventive Services Task Force subject to the Federal Advisory Committee Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthy Families Act of 2014.

section.header: United States Preventive Services Task Force
section.text: Section 915(a) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 299bâ€“4(a)) is amended by striking paragraph (5) and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: The Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U.S.C. App.) shall apply to the Task Force.
